decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number (s): DN 01 REV K Planning Drawings, DN 02 REV K Existing Site Plan, Proposed Site Plan, Existing walls to be removed plan, DN 03 REV K Existing and Proposed Floor Plans, DN 08 REV K Existing and Proposed Elevations, DN 09 REV K Proposed Sections.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow variation in the configuration of the ground floor kitchen and utility area, resulting in the relocation of the door to access the side passage and kitchen window location and Enlargement of the existing 2x Velux windows to pitched roof in relation to planning permission reference 240262HH dated 08/03/2024 for 'Single storey rear extension; alteration to rear patio; alteration to external rear and side elevation'
